sub_title: Educational developer & coach for language tutors RU, ENG, PL
summary:
Enthusiastic and proactive educational specialist, well capable of creating safe and fun learning environments. Being an empathic and reflective person, I interact well with large groups of learners and individuals. My whole life I've been working in education, mainly as a language teacher, coach, and educational developer.

Teaching languages is my professional focus and my life passion. I like to think of 'words' being my main tool - to explain, inspire, motivate and discover. I'm able to explain tricky things simply. To listen to another person and to ask the right question at the right moment. I value an individual, goal-oriented and creative approach when organizing learning processes.
 
I enjoy being part of a team, but I'm also disciplined enough to work remotely. I conduct independent research and develop learning materials and tailor-made courses. 

Currently, I'm working at a big project for a German university (Landesinstitut für Schulqualität und Lehrerbildung Sachsen-Anhalt), which will be finished soon. Looking forward to cooperating! So, don't hesitate to contact me.
